item.title: Helldivers II coming to Xbox Series on August 26
item.content:encoded:
• Xbox Series

Super Earth is expanding its operations.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Arrowhead Game Studios will release cooperative third-person shooter Helldivers II for Xbox Series on August 26, the companies announced. Pre-orders are available now via Microsoft Store.

Helldivers II first launched for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on February 8, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via Microsoft Store:

About

The Galaxy’s Last Line of Offence.

Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy in a fast, frantic, and ferocious third-person shooter.

Urgent Broadcast: Super Earth Armed Forces

Freedom. Peace. Democracy.

Your Super Earth-born rights. The key pillars of our civilization.

Of our very existence.

But the war rages on. And everything is once again under threat.

Join the greatest military force the galaxy has ever seen and make this a safe and free place to live.

Key features

  • Become a Legend – You will be assembled into squads of up to four Helldivers and assigned strategic missions. Watch each other’s back—friendly fire is an unfortunate certainty of war, but victory without teamwork is impossible.
  • Loadouts – Rain down freedom from above, sneak through enemy territory, or grit your teeth and charge head-first into the jaws of combat. How you deliver liberty is your choice; you’ll have access to a wide array of explosive firepower, life-saving armor and battle-changing stratagems… the jewel in every Helldiver’s arsenal.
  • Requisition – Super Earth recognizes your hard work with valuable Requisition. Use it to access different rewards that benefit you, your squad, your destroyer ship and our overall war effort.
  • Threats – Everything on every planet wants you dead. That’s what we’re dealing with. Each enemy has distinct and unpredictable characteristics, tactics, and behavior – but they all fight ferociously and without fear or morality.
  • The Galactic War – Capturing enemy planets, defending against invasions, and completing missions will contribute to our overall effort. This war will be won or lost depending on the actions of everyone involved. We stand together, or we fall apart.

Watch a new trailer below.

Xbox Series Announce Trailer

item.content:encoded:

Tamagotchi Plaza debuts at 128,685 retail copies sold.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for week of June 23, 2025 to June 29, 2025.

Mario Kart World for Switch 2 remained the top seller for the fourth week since its launch, moving an additional 145,069 retail copies.

Tamagotchi Plaza was the highest selling new release of the week, opening at 102,289 units on Switch and 26,396 units on Switch 2 for an opening week total of 128,685 retail copies sold.

Death Stranding 2: On the Beach for PlayStation 5opened at 71,974 retail copies sold.

On the hardware side, Switch 2 sold 161,021 units, the Switch family sold 15,323 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 7,333 units, the Xbox Series family sold 353 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 23 units.

item.title: Upin & Ipin Universe launches July 17
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Southeast Asian village life open-world adventure game dated.

Open-world adventure game Upin & Ipin Universe will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on July 17, developer Streamline Studios announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Streamline Studios:

About

Upin & Ipin Universe is a vibrant open-world adventure that brings the charm of tropical Southeast Asian village life to players worldwide. Inspired by the beloved Upin & Ipin animated series, it offers a living, breathing world filled with authentic sights, sounds, and traditions—crafted by Malaysians, for the world.
‍
From bustling markets to quiet rice fields, it captures the essence of kampung (village) life—fireflies at dusk, swaying coconut palms, and the aroma of home-cooked meals. Play as Upin and Ipin on a heartfelt journey, uncovering local legends, helping their community, and immersing themselves in Malaysia’s rich culture, rooted in the heart of Southeast Asia.

Key Features

  • Explore a Vibrant Open-World Kampung – Players will step into a beautifully crafted open-world environment inspired by Kampung Durian Runtuh, filled with authentic Southeast Asian culture and traditions.
  • A Story True to Upin & Ipin‘s Heart – The heartwarming humor, values, and characters from the Upin & Ipin series are woven into engaging quests and gameplay.
  • Family-Friendly Fun – While fans of the beloved series will find familiar faces and stories, Upin & Ipin Universe is designed for all players—offering a heartfelt, exploration-driven adventure that invites the world to experience the beauty of Southeast Asia.
  • Seamlessly Integrated Activities – A variety of to-be-announced activities will be seamlessly woven into the game, encouraging exploration, interaction, and discovery in the open-world environment.
  • A New Adventure in Upin & Ipin‘s World – Upin & Ipin Universe introduces a fully original, canonical storyline, expanding the twins’ world with never-before-seen adventures that deepen the lore and bring fresh experiences to longtime fans and newcomers alike.

‍
